title: SEC Delays Decision on Hashdex Nasdaq and Ark 21Shares Ethereum ETFs
description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has extended its decision timeline regarding the approval of the Hashdex Nasdaq Ethereum ETF until May 30, 2024, according to an announcement on Tuesday. This ETF, if approved, would include both spot ether and futures contracts in its portfolio. The decision to delay comes as the SEC seeks […]

title: Concerns Arise Over SLERF’s Choice Of LBank Amidst Market Volatility
description: The decision by the recently popular memecoin SLERF to select LBank Exchange as its custodian for the donation address has raised eyebrows within the crypto community. LBank has faced serious allegations of misappropriating user funds in the past, casting doubt on its reliability as a custodian.  The recently popular MEMECOIN […]

title: Bitcoin Faces 5% Decline Amidst Market Turbulence
description: Today, Bitcoin, the world’s leading cryptocurrency, experienced a notable 5% decline, slipping below the $64,000 mark, signaling increased volatility in the market. A significant event occurred on the BitMEX exchange where a user initiated a sell-off of more than 400 BTC, causing a temporary price plunge to $8,900. However, according […]
